localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
blogPost.body: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
blogPost.title: LinkFree - Your social website, for free.
blogPost.author: Rédouane Rmdn

localize.description: 我们Snipfeed的团队创建了LinkFree，因为我们认为创作者应该免费将他们最喜欢的链接汇总到一个漂亮的登陆页面中。
我們Snipfeed的團隊創建了LinkFree，因爲我們認爲創作者應該免費將他們最喜歡的鏈接彙總到一個漂亮的登陸頁面中。

previous.title: Don’t waste time arguing with fools. https://t.co/hiWS1mpjG9

localize.full_text: 不要浪费时间和傻瓜争论。https://t.co/hiWS1mpjG9
不要浪費時間和傻瓜爭論。https://t.co/hiWS1mpjG9

next.excerpt: Make your user interface a little bit better by receiving weekly UI/UX insights. If you're a developer, solo-founder, product manager, or you feel the pain of user interface design this newsletter is specially for you.
next.title: UserInterface.io - Weekly UI/UX tips in your inbox for free

localize.description: 通过接收每周的UI/UX见解，让你的用户界面变得更好一点。如果你是开发者、独创者、产品经理，或者你感受到了用户界面设计的痛苦，这本时事通讯是专门为你准备的。
localize.tagline: 每周在您的收件箱中免费发送UI/UX提示。

localize.description: 通過接收每週的UI/UX見解，讓你的用戶界面變得更好一點。如果你是開發者、獨創者、產品經理，或者你感受到了用戶界面設計的痛苦，這本時事通訊是專門爲你準備的。
localize.tagline: 每週在您的收件箱中免費發送UI/UX提示。
